text: illeogalodoe hananimkkeseo i geosgwa igeos-eul geumgi hayeossdaneun geos-eul jeung-inhaneun jung-in-eul ileuge hala geu deul-i geuleohan jung-geoleul ileudolog haess eossda hadeolado geudaeneun geojishaneun geudeul gaunde issji malmyeo ttohan malsseum eul geoyeoghago naeseleul midji aniha myeo geudeul-i junim-e daleun geos-eul biyu haneun ideul-ui geojis yogmang-e ttaleuji malla illeossnola
